family_id.Description: Family identifier (participants belonging to the same family share a family_id)

age.Description: Age (in years, rounded down) at session 1

age_ses02.Description: Age (in years, rounded down) at session 2

sex.Description: Sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: Handedness of the participant as reported by the participant (all QTIM participants are right-handed)

nback_seq.Description: Stimulus presentation time for the nback task. During data acqusition for the 12 year old  participants, the nback stimulus presentation time was increased as younger participants had difficulty with the 1 sec presentation

group.Description: Is the participant part of the the test-retest or longitudinal subsample? Test-retest interval between scans approximately 3.5 months; longitudinal interval between scans approximately 3.5 years
